name: dhanos
preBuildCommands-linux: if [ $$DUB_BUILD_TYPE = "debug" ]; then echo webview.c debug compiled && gcc -c $PACKAGE_DIR/Source/webview.c -O0 -DWEBVIEW_GTK=1 -DWEBVIEW_IMPLEMENTATION `pkg-config --cflags --libs gtk+-3.0 webkit2gtk-4.0` -o $PACKAGE_DIR/webview.o; fi

if [ $$DUB_BUILD_TYPE = "release" ]; then echo webview.c release compiled && gcc -c $PACKAGE_DIR/Source/webview.c -O2 -DWEBVIEW_GTK=1 -DWEBVIEW_IMPLEMENTATION `pkg-config --cflags --libs gtk+-3.0 webkit2gtk-4.0` -o $PACKAGE_DIR/webview.o; fi
